summary:
LC Mercenary Armory have two different armors to you equip yourself and your followers and mount your mercenary group .

descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Yellow][b][size=5]Thank you to all who have endorsed and supported my work via donations â€“ you are the best! :D[/size][/b][/color][/center]

[center][YOUTUBE]0CVjvmamdAc[/YOUTUBE][/center]

LC Mercenary Armory have two different armors to you equip yourself and your followers and mount your mercenary group .


The armors have good defense and easy craft in iron category.

1- Light and Heavy in two models.

2- Female and male ( better to male).
